title: Sweetcorn fritters
ingredients: ['140 g (5 oz) plain flour', '½ tsp baking powder', '150 ml (5 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '2 large eggs, lightly beaten', '400 g (14 oz) frozen sweetcorn kernels, thawed and drained', '3 spring onions, finely chopped', '1 fat fresh red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '3 heape1/2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '115 g (4 oz) watercress', 'salt and pepper', 'Yogurt sauce', '300 g (10½ oz) Greek-style yogurt', '4 spring onions, finely chopped', '2 tbsp chopped fresh mint', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lime']
